name: 619Cloud
overview:
619Cloud provides personalized managed VPS hosting in the cloud. We design, implement, and manage virtual private server solutions exclusively for clients that have outgrown traditional shared hosting.

619Cloud solutions fills the huge performance gap between entry-level shared hosting and extremely expensive dedicated server hosting. Our Standard solution will smoke any shared package you can find in terms of performance and reliability and our Professional solution rivals a fully dedicated server, at a fraction of the cost.

Cloud hosting offers many benefits over traditional hosting, but one of the core themes is the ability to dynamically add and remove resources to servers, and even clone, or copy, entire servers. This allows our clients to respond to a large traffic influxes very quickly.

Simply put, 619Cloud solutions can handle more traffic per dollar. There are no contracts, and billing is month-to-month with the option to cancel at anytime.
